short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture an HTML snapshot of the current page with one click. Easily manage history and recycle bin. Supports data import and export.
short.zh_CN: 一键保存当前网页的HTML快照,轻松管理历史记录与回收站。支持数据导入导出。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Freeze.page is an efficient and practical Chrome extension that helps you conveniently download HTML snapshots of the current webpage or save them to a history list. Whether it's important articles, information, or interesting content, with just one click, you can save them permanently.
long.zh_CN: Freeze.page 是一款高效实用的 Chrome 插件，帮助您便捷地下载当前网页的 HTML 快照，或者将其保存到历史列表中。无论是重要的文章、资料，还是有趣的内容，只需一键，即可永久保存。
